thread.title: BRIEF-National Geographic Partners Names Gary Knell As CEO

title: BRIEF-National Geographic Partners Names Gary Knell As CEO

organizations.name: brief-national geographic partners names gary knell as ceo reuters
reuters) - board of national geographic partners

text:
22 PM / in 2 minutes BRIEF-National Geographic Partners Names Gary Knell As CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Board of National Geographic Partners: 
* BOARD OF NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC PARTNERS SAYS GARY KNELL NAMED TO SUCCEED DECLAN MOORE AS NEW CEO OF NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC PARTNERS 
* BOARD OF NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC PARTNERS SAYS KNELL WILL OVERSEE ALL OF NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC'S ASSETS, INCLUDING TV, MAGAZINE, PRINT & DIGITAL OPERATIONS, OTHERS Source text: ( bit.ly/2ExcgV6 ) Further company coverage:
